Author: Infi, Anna, Pox4eveR
Name: Glande Chat2
Punchline: Glande Chat2 - Enhanced chat with advanced Direct Message system and 7TV emotes
Description: Glande Chat2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin with advanced Direct Message functionality. Features unlimited tabs, enhanced emotes (BetterTTV + 7TV), customizable sizing, dedicated DM tabs and windows, pop-out DM windows with native collapse/expand, smart message routing, cross-world player support, performance-optimized DM windows (7-13 FPS improvement), intelligent focus management, custom DM color schemes, auto-open DM on new tells, and friend integration with party invite and adventurer plate access.
